mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE notice_type_id = #{noticeTypeId}

SELECT notice_id, NOTICE_IMG_ID, NOTICE_TYPE_ID, notice_type_name, notice_title, notice_date_created FROM ( SELECT seq, notice_id, NOTICE_IMG_ID, NOTICE_TYPE_ID, notice_type_name, notice_title, notice_date_created FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, notice_id, NOTICE_IMG_ID, NOTICE_TYPE_ID, notice_type_name, notice_title, notice_date_created FROM ( SELECT noti.notice_id, noti.NOTICE_IMG_ID, noti.NOTICE_TYPE_ID, type.notice_type_name, noti.notice_title, noti.notice_date_created FROM notice noti LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_type type ON (noti.notice_type_id = type.notice_type_id) ORDER BY noti.notice_date_created DESC ) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}

SELECT notice_id, NOTICE_IMG_ID, NOTICE_TYPE_ID, notice_type_name, notice_title, notice_date_created FROM ( SELECT seq, notice_id, NOTICE_IMG_ID, NOTICE_TYPE_ID, notice_type_name, notice_title, notice_date_created FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, notice_id, NOTICE_IMG_ID, NOTICE_TYPE_ID, notice_type_name, notice_title, notice_date_created FROM ( SELECT noti.notice_id, noti.NOTICE_IMG_ID, noti.NOTICE_TYPE_ID, type.notice_type_name, noti.notice_title, noti.notice_date_created FROM notice noti LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_type type ON (noti.notice_type_id = type.notice_type_id) WHERE noti.notice_type_id=#{noticeTypeId} ORDER BY noti.notice_date_created DESC) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}

SELECT noti.notice_id, noim.NOTICE_IMG_ID, noti.NOTICE_TYPE_ID, type.notice_type_name, noti.notice_title, noti.notice_content, noti.notice_date_created, noim.notice_img_1, noim.notice_img_2, noim.notice_img_3, noim.notice_img_4, noim.notice_img_5 FROM notice noti LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_type type ON (noti.notice_type_id = type.notice_type_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN notice_images noim ON (noti.notice_img_id = noim.notice_img_id) WHERE noti.notice_id = #{noticeId}
